channel.title: Jekyll on Scott's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Scott's Weblog

item.title: Converting URLs to Jekyll References
item.description: In my post about the story behind the migration, I mentioned that I made extensive use of regular expressions (“regexes”) to help reformat portions of the Markdown documents that are used by Jekyll to build this site. In this post, I wanted to briefly share one of the regexes I used (and am still using) to convert URLs to Jekyll references. First, let me clarify what I mean by Jekyll references.
